User Reviews: The first one I received quickly locked up and prevented downloading items from Microsoft store or even windows updates.  No matter what I tried, it would not work right. Product Names: Apple MacBook Air MJVM2LL/A 11.6-Inch laptop(1.6 GHz Intel i5, 128 GB SSD, Integrated Intel HD Graphics 6000, Mac OS X Yosemite (Renewed)
User Reviews: Overall I‚Äôm quite happy with this purchase so far. The laptop shipped a lot earlier than the estimated delivery date, and arrived in new condition with no damage or scratches. The laptop runs great for what I need it for, which is mainly word processing. It has difficulty with video streaming but this could be due to an outdated or missing plugin. The wireless does not run as fast as I‚Äôd hoped and the battery life is (understandably) reduced from the product description‚Äôs purported ‚Äú10 hours of battery life.‚Äù I can get about three hours unplugged if I‚Äôm not using a lot of internet or CPU power. It charges back up again very quickly though. It also only has four GB of RAM, something I wish I‚Äôd been more careful to check before I ordered this. As a result the laptop bogs down quite quickly while multitasking. However, I love the feel of the keyboard and the backlit keys, and I‚Äôm quite happy with it as a little writing machine.This laptop is an excellent inexpensive option for students or people looking for a *very* lightweight and functional laptop for writing, note taking, and general office tasks. However, this is by no means a gaming laptop, and it is hard-pressed to handle high performance demands or high-bandwidth internet tasks like streaming or large downloads.
